product_name: Platypus SoftBottle Water Bottle with Closure Cap - 17 fl. oz. - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Flexible, lightweight and durable, the 17 fl. oz. Platypus SoftBottle(TM) Water Bottle with Closure Cap takes up less space than a traditional water bottle. 80% lighter than standard hard-plastic bottles, it takes more than 5 Platypus SoftBottles to equal the weight of one 1-liter, hard-plastic bottle. Compact and flexible design can be flattened when empty and rolled up to fit practically anywhere in your pack. Platypus SoftBottle(TM) Water Bottle is sized to fit in a drink holder, round pocket, square pocket or in your hand. Food-grade polyethylene lining ensures bottle won't retain flavors or taste like plastic; plus, it's 100% BPA free. Screw-on closure cap. Closeout.
